texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.Login:Title: Water Control System
texts.Login:Item2: The system transmits small meter, large meter and flowmeter through wireless network
texts.Login:Item3: Multiple devices are used for data collection and control
texts.Login:Item4: Multiple device protocols are supported and flexibleã€‚
